object.name: contact
object.property: <model xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:lingua="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/lingua" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>street</title> </field> <field name="number" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>number</title> </field> <field name="box" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>box</title> </field> <field name="postalcode" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>postalcode</title> </field> <field name="city" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>city</title> </field> <field name="country" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>country</title> </field> <field name="tva" type="zope.schema.TextLine">
